MemoryInfobox.description: 'Facing the final challenger of the Battle of One Hundred Hands, Roxana of Hydrea, Kassandra's grit and morals would be tested.'

General_Description: '''Legend No More''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra faced [[Roxana]] in the finale of the [[Battle of One Hundred Hands]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra and Roxana took their positions opposite one another on the final battleground.
{{-}}
<tabber>
|-|If Kassandra met and trained with Roxana=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It seems like the training has paid off.''
*'''Roxana:''' ''I was about to say the same.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''Enough chatter. Our [[Cult of Kosmos|patrons]] demand a champion. Finish this!''
*'''Roxana:''' ''There's no escaping our fate,'' [[Mercenary|misthios]].
{{#tag:tabber|
If Roxana was romanced=
{{#tag:tabber|
We don't have to do this.=
[[File:ACOD Legend No More 3.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra trying to convince Roxana]]
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We can lay down our weapons. There's nothing more to prove.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''This is outrageous. Roxana—only one of you can win the Battle and become champion.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We don't have to kill each other.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''Think of the riches, Roxana. Indeed, everything you've dreamed of is almost within your grasp.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We can walk away.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''Only one of you can walk away a legend.''
*'''Roxana:''' ''The stakes were clear from the beginning, Kassandra. Don't do this. I'm so close—''
*'''Drakios:''' ''Enough! The Battle must end now!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No. Roxana, we decide how this ends. Not him.''
Roxana reflected for a moment, hesitant.
*'''Roxana:''' ''I'm beginning to think there are things more important than riches and glory.''
{{#tag:tabber|
🤝Join me.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Join me on [[Adrestia|my ship]]. There are more adventures for us out on the [[Aegean Sea|Aegean]].''
*'''Roxana:''' ''I will! I will join you!''
*'''Drakios:''' ''No! You must finish the battle!''
Kassandra turned to Drakios and drew the [[Spear of Leonidas]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's over, Drakios.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''It's over when I say it's over. [[Soldier|Guards]]!''
[[File:ACOD Legend No More 4.png|thumb|250px|Cult of Kosmos scions confronting the champions]]
Two scions of the Cult of Kosmos ran forward to join Drakios. They attacked Kassandra, but Roxana stood with her. The two women fought side by side against the crooked organizer of the Battle of One Hundred Hands, slaying him and all of his men. Kassandra approached Roxana after the battle.
*'''Roxana:''' ''Thank you, champion.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So, I'll see you at my [[ship]]?''
*'''Roxana:''' ''Yes. I'm ready to go wherever the sea wind takes us.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Wherever it is, adventure awaits. For both of us, now.''
They turned to stare at the sea.
{{!}}-{{!}}
⚔️I want riches and glory.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm here to win.''
Roxana's face fell on hearing Kassandra's declaration to kill her, in spite of their time together and having offered a truce mere moments before. Steeling herself from the pain, she looked Kassandra in the eyes and responded. 
*'''Roxana:''' ''So be it.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''When this is over, I will make an offering to [[Minerva|Athena]] in your honor.''
[[File:ACOd-LegendNoMore-altKassRoxDrak.jpg|thumb|250px|Kassandra clashing with Roxana]]
The fight began.
*'''Roxana:''' ''Come on! We need this to be a fight we are remembered for.''
After a while, Kassandra dealt a blow to Roxana.
*'''Roxana:''' ''Finally. Not playing anymore, are we?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No, we're not.''
Kassandra landed more attacks.
*'''Roxana:''' ''Yes! This is the kind of fight we'll be remembered for.''
Kassandra defeated Roxana and killed her, then claimed [[Trade Goods|Roxana's shield]] as a prize.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take this [[shield]] to the [[Statue of Athena]] in Athens. Farewell, brave warrior.''
Kassandra then approached Drakios, who applauded her victory.
*'''Drakios:''' ''Well done, ''misthios''. We should return to the [[Melos (city)|city]] for your ceremony.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''First I want the information you promised me.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''I don't think so.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No more games! Tell me what you know about the Cult.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''Truth is, ''misthios'', the Battle of One Hundred Hands was always a bit of a trap. Indeed, we've been doing it for years, hoping to draw out the sibling of the warrior [[Alexios|Deimos]].''
{{#tag:tabber|
Here I am.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You've found me.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''As I suspected.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And you know what I'm capable of.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''Indeed, I do.''
{{!}}-{{!}}
⚖️I don't know what you're talking about.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That all means nothing to me.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''Oh, come now, ''misthios''. We ''have'' found you. Indeed, everything's gone according to plan.''
}}
Kassandra drew out the Spear of Leonidas.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I've killed many people today, Drakios. I can make it one more.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''Today is the day I earn a big bonus from the masked ones. I was hoping we could do this elsewhere, but—''
Cultists guards appeared beside Drakios.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I have plenty of fight left.''
Kassandra defeated Drakios and the guards.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''All these people died just for the Cult to find me...''
Following up on her promise, Kassandra later travelled to Athens and placed Roxana's shield at the base of the Statue of Athena, but could not help choking up as she prayed to the [[Greek mythology|goddess]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If you are out there, Athena, please watch over Roxana of Hydrea. She... fought honorably.''
}}
{{!}}-{{!}}
⚔️There can only be one champion.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We both came here to win the Battle of One Hundred Hands.''
*'''Roxana:''' ''Then we'll finish this as per tradition. With one champion above the rest.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''When this is over, I will make an offering to Athena in your honor.''
[[File:ACOd-LegendNoMore-altKassRoxDrak.jpg|thumb|250px|Kassandra clashing with Roxana]]
The fight began.
*'''Roxana:''' ''Come on! We need this to be a fight we are remembered for.''
After a while, Kassandra dealt a blow to Roxana.
*'''Roxana:''' ''Finally. Not playing anymore, are we?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No, we're not.''
Kassandra landed more attacks.
*'''Roxana:''' ''Yes! This is the kind of fight we'll be remembered for.''
Kassandra defeated Roxana and killed her, then claimed Roxana's shield as a prize.

*'''Drakios:''' ''I don't think so.''

*'''Drakios:''' ''Truth is, ''misthios'', the Battle of One Hundred Hands was always a bit of a trap. Indeed, we've been doing it for years, hoping to draw out the sibling of the warrior Deimos.''

|-|If Kassandra did not meet Roxana=
*'''Roxana:''' ''I saw you fighting out there, ''misthios''. It was impressive. I would say you're [[Sparta]]n, but what you did is not something they train for at the ''[[agoge]].
{{#tag:tabber|
I'm like nobody you've fought for before.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm not a typical ''misthios''. This fight will be unlike any you've had before.''
*'''Roxana:''' ''That maybe. But it's my destiny to win this Battle, a destiny that's been years in the making. I sincerely hope you're as strong as you say. It will make the songs they write about this day that much more epic.''
{{!}}-{{!}}
I'm just another misthios.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I ''am'' a Spartan by blood. But I'm also just another ''misthios'' chasing [[drachma]]e.''
*'''Roxana:''' ''You must have learned to fight like that somewhere.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I grew up alone and fought for everything I've ever had. Must have picked up a few tricks along the way.''
*'''Roxana:''' ''A pity. I hoped to fell a celebrated opponent here to fix my legend. Oh well. You'll have to do.''
}}
*'''Drakios:''' ''There will be no legend to sing about until this Battle is finished.''
*'''Roxana:''' ''Fine. Let's finish it.''
[[File:ACOd-LegendNoMore-altKassRoxDrak.jpg|thumb|250px|Kassandra clashing with Roxana]]
The fight began.
*'''Roxana:''' ''Come on! We need this to be a fight we are remembered for.''
After a while, Kassandra dealt a blow to Roxana.
*'''Roxana:''' ''Finally. Not playing anymore, are we?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No, we're not.''
Kassandra landed more attacks.
*'''Roxana:''' ''Yes! This is the kind of fight we'll be remembered for.''
Kassandra defeated Roxana and killed her, then approached Drakios, who applauded her victory.
*'''Drakios:''' ''Well done, ''misthios''. We should return to the city for your ceremony.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''First I want the information you promised me.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''I don't think so.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No more games! Tell me what you know about the Cult.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''Truth is, ''misthios'', the Battle of One Hundred Hands was always a bit of a trap. Indeed, we've been doing it for years, hoping to draw out the sibling of the warrior Deimos.''
{{#tag:tabber|
Here I am.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You've found me.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''As I suspected.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And you know what I'm capable of.''
*'''Drakios:''' ''Indeed, I do.''
{{!}}-{{!}}

*'''Drakios:''' ''Oh, come now, ''misthios''. We ''have'' found you. Indeed, everything's gone according to plan.''

Kassandra drew out the Spear of Leonidas.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''I have plenty of fight left.''
Kassandra defeated Drakios and the guards.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''All these people died just for the Cult to find me...''
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra made her way to the finals of the Battle of One Hundred Hands, then slew Drakios and the Cultists of Kosmos who financed it, shutting down the practice of the battle royale.
